Is the pope gay

In January of 2021 I created a one-pager called ‚ÄúIs the Pope gay?‚Äù. As is the case with so many of my other ideas, I came up with this website because something happened on the Internet: the .gay domain extension had just become available. Next to isthepope.gay, I registered a wide variety of domains. My favorite was everyoneatthevaticanis.gay, which led to my own website.

After a year of cheap fun I‚Äôve let go of all of my .gay domains, but this project remains on Netlify.

Eager to let me know what you think? Email me a reply or send a webmention.

Okay good talk.

Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they) is a researcher, designer, and queer facilitator from Amsterdam. She has a keen interest in (digital) humanities and behavioral sciences, yoga practice, and amateur cooking.
